alert.note: Alert for Rabun; Stephens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:45AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Stephens, southeastern Rabun and southwestern Oconee Counties through 730 AM EDT... At 645 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Toccoa, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Toccoa, Walhalla, Westminster, Martin, Avalon, Oconee State Park, Mountain Rest, Long Creek, Boydville and Eastanolee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
